column4: hi all, I have 2 sata hard drives (One with WinXP and one with Ubuntu).  Is there a way I can make my computer ask me which drive I would like to boot into?
could you reccomend a boot loader
ok, Ill google it, thanks
grub will do that, so will lilo.  grub is the default ubuntu bootloader
if you've already installed ubuntu, read the first link ubotu is sening you
check your query from ubotu
if you don't know, you're almost certainly not ;)
what reasons do they give?  your prior comments are rather vague
ok, will post
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/28743/
i dont see why it cant just keep alcarte as it is
that's an error, it looks like.  In alacarte's dependencies, would you mind filing a bug at launchpad.net?
just a clerical error, looks like the dependency is misversioned
seems like an aptitude problem to me... it says this for 263 other packages...
plus synaptic does not do it
oh, well, maybe Im not seeing something.  Definately file a bug though.
ok, where exactly, please
launchpad.net then search for the aptitude, then file a bug
will do :-)
thanks.  Just give as much info as you can.
sure
launchpad says to use the official bugtracker for aptitude, do you know where that is please?
